experience.title: Computer Vision Intern
experience.description: Worked on road-edge detection and crack-detection solutions using Image Processing operations in OpenCV .

tab1.title: Road Edge Deterioration Detector
tab1.description: Developed an advanced image processing algorithm to detect and analyze road edge deterioration using RunSAT and Hough transform methods during my internhsip with RoadGauge Ltd.

tab1.title: Unique Cracks Detector from GoPro Video
tab1.description: Implemented a system to ensure unique crack detection, eliminating duplicates and accurately merging overlapping cracks in the final JSON output as bounding boxes

tab1.title: Sentiment Analysis with Sarcasm and Emojis
tab1.description: Developed a lightweight hybrid deep learning model combining Bi-directional LSTM and Multi-Head Self-Attention for sarcasm- and emoji-aware sentiment analysis. Created a custom sarcasm and emoji-enriched dataset using the Google Gemini API, integrated with the IMDB dataset to improve model generalization.

tab1.title: JPEG Image Compression
tab1.description: Applied lossy compression algorithms to reduce image file sizes while preserving visual quality, demonstrating proficiency in image processing and software development. Implemented using Python, utilizing OpenCV and Streamlit to develop a user-friendly application.

tab1.title: Preseatation Video Slides Extractor
tab1.description: Implemented a python script taking input a video of any meeting with presentations on it, extracting and storing each slide in the presenatation locally

tab1.title: Road Bleeding Detector
tab1.description: Implemented python scripts for detecting road bleeding from road images and inference masks utilizing OpenCV and Image Processing Techniques

tab2.title: FitnessFusion
tab2.description: Design & Development of a fitness application for assigning workout and diet plans to end users with 3 differenct modes of application (Admin, Trainer and Trainee) in Flutter and Node JS with MySQL.

tab2.title: Cloud Video Storage App
tab2.description: A Cloud Video storage app based on microservices architecture utilizing Google Cloud Buckets for video storage and Node/Express JS for Backend Management.

tab2.title: IChat - Chatting Application in Java
tab2.description: A Simple Peer to Peer Chatting Appilation made in java utilizing Java Socket and Swing UI Library

tab3.title: Test Portal
tab3.description: A Simple Console based Test Portal application for Quiz based Questions with different difficulty levels and multiple subjects.
